text: Inside @CodeGuidedev I added a virtual computer that can code for you 24/7. I'm calling it codespace. You can call it a claude code wrapper but with 10x better UI and 50% cheaper.
author: CJ Zafir

text: The future of coding is autonomous. I run codespace instances for 12 hours everyday on average and it costs me $35 - $55/day. Results: 99% of development inside @CodeGuidedev is now done by this Agent. Try it today for only $29/month (new pricing $49/month)
author: CJ Zafir

text: Reasoning is central to purposeful action. Today we introduce MolmoAct — a fully open Action Reasoning Model (ARM) for robotics. Grounded in large-scale pre-training with action reasoning data, every predicted action is interpretable and user-steerable via visual trace. We are
author: Jiafei Duan

text: If you're a designer vibe coding software with Cursor, Windsurf, or Claude code and you're tired of your UI just being AI slop... Take a look at my workflow for getting my designs from Figma into actual code for my web app.
author: Sam Lane

text: Working on Torch Unified health record + LLM in one iOS app. Syncs records from hospitals, labs, Function, One Med, PDFs etc. Makes it simple & fast to get all your health data in one place + get LLM help making sense of it. Reply/RT for TestFlight invite. More below
author: Ilya Abyzov

text: Met a shopkeeper (chemist) today … He is a Marwadi. He opened his 3rd shop recently and when congratulated … he shared something interesting about his story धंधा 1000 दिन चले। - In Marwadi tradition, if you start a business, you give it 1000 days. When he first started his
author: Vineeth K

text: HubSpot starts at $50/month. By the time you're growing, you're paying $1,200+/month. Want basic reporting? That’s extra. Want to remove branding? Extra. It's a CRM trap. Someone will build a leaner, saner version — and eat their lunch
author: Fraser

text: Most AI agents are just workflows in disguise.
author: Aakash Gupta

text: I've worked with more than 50 freelancers, it's amazing how low the bar is. And I'm not even talking about technical skills. Do those easy things and I'll guarantee you'll be in the top 5%: ‧ answer emails in < 48h ‧ deliver on time ‧ notify when having delay ‧
author: Pierre de Wulf

text: Julius (@juliusai_) Julius is an AI data analyst where you can upload files and create analyzes/visualizations in natural language. IMO, it's much more reliable than ChatGPT - and easier to use for repeat flows. Ex. Plot data exports from the Fed + ask Qs on trends
author: Olivia Moore

text: Rbi is now serious about a freer rupee. The world can now trade in rupees and park the money in Indian government securities. And earlier they allowed Indian banks to open rupee accounts (vostros) as correspondent banks without need for rbi approval. Good steps.
author: Deepak Shenoy
